content: **crocheted jumper in drops air the piece is worked top down with round yoke and double neck sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-453 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 300-350-400-450-450-500 colour 30 sage green **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 5 mm **crochet gauge** 14 treble crochets in width and 8 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
